Package org.consensusj.proxy

JSON-RPC reverse proxy for bitcoind powered by Ratpack

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitcoinRpcProxyModule
    Guice Module to create handlers and client for JSON-RPC Proxy Adds a few handlers to the JsonRpcClientModule
    ChainStatusHandler
    Handle a GET request by posting a "getblockchaininfo" and returning the response
    GenerateHandler
    Get requests will generate a block (regtest only)
    ProxyMain
    Main class for a Bitcoin RPC reverse proxy server

Package org.consensusj.proxy Description

JSON-RPC reverse proxy for bitcoind powered by Ratpack
